column2: "Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw. Ao
column3: Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE; na oye; Na n’ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa."

column2: "Woana botum aka EWURADZE n’akatakyi ndwuma akyerɛ
column3: Anaa ɔada n’ayɛyi nyinara edzi?"

column2: "Esiarfo nye hɔn a wɔyɛ pɛrpɛr
column3: Na hɔn wɔyɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee mber nyinara."

column2: "Ao
column3: EWURADZE
column4: kaa me wɔ enyisɔ a ewɔ no wɔ wo man ho no mu; Fa wo nkwagye no bɛsera me."

column2: "Ma meehu hɔn a asan mu eyi hɔn no hɔn eyiedzi
column3: Ma meedzi ehurusi wɔ wo man ahosɛpɛw mu

column2: "Yɛnye hɛn egyanom ayɛ bɔn
column3: Yɛayɛ emumuyɛ

column2: "Hɛn egyanom anntse w’anwanwadze ase wɔ Egypt; Wɔannkaa wo mbɔbɔrhu dodow no; Na wɔtseew Ɔsorsornyi no do etua wɔ po no ho
column3: mekyerɛ Mbɛw Po no ho."

column2: "Naaso ɔgyee hɔn nkwa wɔ ne dzin ntsi
column3: Ma wɔaama woehu no tum ahoɔdzen."

column2: "Otwuuw Mbɛw Po no so enyim na ɔwewee; Nna ogyaa hɔn faa ebun no mu
column3: dɛ sar do."

column2: "Na ɔgyee hɔn nkwa fii nyia okyir hɔn no nsamu
column3: Na ɔpoon hɔn fii atamfo no nsamu."

column2: "Na esu no kataa hɔn atamfo do: Hɔn mu baako ara mpo annka."
"Nna wɔgyee ne nsɛm dzii; Wɔtoow n’ayɛyindwom."
"Ntsɛmara na hɔn werɛ fiir no ndwuma; Wɔanntweɔn n’akwankyerɛ."
"Na wonyaa akɔndɔ dzendzenndzen wɔ sar no do
column3: Na wɔsɔɔ Nyankopɔn hwɛe wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ no do."

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn ebisadze maa hɔn; Mbom ɔdze ɔfɔn baa hɔn kra mu."
"Ber a hɔn enyi beer Moses so wɔ nseraban no mu
column3: Na Aaron EWURADZE no krɔnkrɔnnyi no."

column2: "Na asaase buei na ɔmeen Datan
column3: Na ɔkataa Abiram no kuw no do."

column2: "Na wɔsɔɔ gya wɔ hɔn kuw no mu: Ogyaframee no hyeew emumuyɛfo no."
"Wɔyɛɛ nantwiba wɔ Horeb
column3: Na wɔsɔɔr ehonyi a woegu."

column2: "Na wɔsakyeer Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam Yɛɛ nantwi a odzi efuw saso."
"Hɔn werɛ fiir hɔn gyefo Nyankopɔn
column3: Ɔno a ɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba akɛse wɔ Egypt no:"

column2: "Anwanwa ndwuma wɔ Ham asaase do
column3: Na ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ hu wɔ Mbɛw Po no ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔsee dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn; Sɛ nnyɛ dɛ ne mpamunyi Moses gyinaa ntamu
column3: Dɛ ɔbɛdan n’ebufuw

column2: "Nyew
column3: wobuu asaase fɛɛfɛw no tootooba; Wɔanngye n’asɛm enndzi."

column2: "Na wohwinhwinii wɔ hɔn asesee mu; Na woenntsie EWURADZE ndze."
"Dɛm ntsi ɔmaa ne nsa do tsiaa hɔn
column3: Dɛ ɔbɛma wɔahwehwe ase wɔ sar no do:"

column2: "Na ɔabɔ hɔn asefo egu amanaman mu; Na ɔabɔ hɔn apetse asaase no do."
"Wɔdze hɔnho so kɔbɔɔ Baal-peor ho
column3: Na wodzii ewufo afɔrbɔdze no."

column2: "Dɛm na wɔdze hɔn nyɛe eyi no ebufuw; Na ɔyardɔm sii hɔn mu."
"Nna Finehas soɛree
column3: na obuu atsɛn: Na ɔyardɔm no siankae."

column2: "Na wobuu iyi tsenenee maa no
column3: Kodu mbasantsen nyinara daa daa."

column2: "Woyii no ebufuw so wɔ Meriba esu no ho; Ma okowiee bɔn maa Moses wɔ hɔn ntsi:"
"Osiandɛ wɔtseew no sunsum do etua
column3: Ma n’ano tɔɔ ase."

column2: "Wɔannsɛɛ aman no
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɔn no;"

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔnho foraforaa amanaman no mu
column3: Na wosuasuaa hɔn ndwuma:"

column2: "Na wɔsoom hɔn ehonyi; Ɔno na ɔbɛyɛɛ efir maa hɔn:"
"Nyew
column3: wɔdze hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa bobɔɔ afɔr maa abosom
column5: "Na wɔkaa bɔgya a onndzi so gui
column6: mekyerɛ hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa bɔgyaa a; Hɔn a wɔdze hɔn bobɔɔ afɔr maa Keenan ehonyi no; Ma wɔdze bɔgya huraa asaase no ho."

column2: "Dɛm na wɔdze hɔn ndwuma guu hɔn ho fi
column3: Na wɔdze hɔn nyɛe daan ndwaman."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛɛw ne man do
column3: Na okyiir n’egyapadze."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ amanaman nsamu; Na hɔn a wokyir hɔn no dzii hɔn do tum."
"Hɔn atamfo so haaw hɔn
column3: Na wɔbrɛɛ hɔn adze hyɛɛ hɔn nsa ase."

column2: "Mber pii na ɔgyee hɔn; Naaso wɔtseew etua wɔ hɔn apam mu
column3: Na hɔn emumuyɛ brɛɛ hɔn adze."

column2: "Naaso hɔn ahokyer no hiaa no
column3: Ber a ɔtsee hɔn sufrɛ no:"

column2: "Na ɔkaa n’ahyɛmu maa hɔn
column3: Na mbɔbɔrhu dodow ntsi ogyaa mu ma ɔkae."

column2: "Ɔmaa hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum no so Wohun hɔn mbɔbɔr."
"EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn
column3: gye hɛn nkwa
column4: Na tase hɛn fi amanaman no mu
column5: Na yɛmbɛda wo dzin krɔnkrɔn no ase
column6: Na yendzi konyim wɔ w’ayɛyi no mu."

column2: "Nhyira nka EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn
column4: Mfi daapem nkesi daapem mpo. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ
